channel.title: Duel question
channel.description: when your going through the set up for duel, you know how you can click the helm then you cant use it right?, well everything works but that i dont know how to add it into game, any help would be amazing! 742 sever btw

item.title: Duel question
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Tfougere, post:3, topic:527730”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646481.msg4347696#msg4347696 date=1376149106]
What? How do you know everything works if it’s not even added? You might want to clarify a bit.
[/quote]

when you challenge someone to a friendly or staked you can change the options like no range and that stuff but when i click on say the helm, so that you can use the helm in the duel it doesnt cross out[/quote]
It doesn’t cross out, but it works? That means your server isn’t sending the configs.

Read full topic
